mapper.sql: SELECT A.f_id as id, A.f_purchase_id as purchaseId, B.f_name as centerName, C.f_name as commodityName, D.f_name as marketName, E.f_number as number, E.f_price as price, A.f_status as status, A.f_create_time as createTime, A.f_update_time as updateTime from t_center_delivery A,t_market_purchase E, t_distribution_center B, t_commodity C, t_supermarket D WHERE A.f_purchase_id=E.f_id and E.f_commodity_id=C.f_id and E.f_market_id=D.f_id and E.f_center_id=B.f_id
